step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your shoulders relaxed and arms extended overhead, fingers open.
As you begin to make a fist, focus on pushing your arms down and squeezing your shoulder blades together. Keep your elbows slightly bent.
Great job tightening your muscles and squeezing your shoulder blades. Remember to inhale during this phase.
Excellent! Fully extend your arms back overhead while exhaling and relaxing your muscles.
You completed the first repetition well. Ensure your fingers are spread wide at the top of the movement.
Second rep starting strong. Maintain comfortable posture and extend arms overhead with fingers open.
Good form on the push down. Focus on squeezing shoulder blades together and keeping elbows slightly bent.
Nicely done on the muscle tightening and shoulder blade squeeze. Remember to breathe in during this step.
Excellent extension and exhale. Arms are back overhead, muscles relaxed.
Great finish to the second rep! Ensure your fingers are spread wide as you reach overhead.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your fingers open and spread wide when reaching overhead. Focus on squeezing your shoulder blades together as you push down, and breathe in during that phase.
